amendment.description: Amendment requires Federal agencies to consider the environmental benefits of the vendors with which they contract for meetings and conferences.
amendment.purpose: An amendment numbered 8 printed in Part B of House Report 110-300 to require all federal government agencies to change their acquisitions rules for planning meetings and conferences to consider the environmentally preferable features and practices of a vendor, similar to the acquisition rules of the Environmental Protection Agency.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Schwartz amendment (A008) Agreed to by voice vote.
